results.name: Number of primitive Pythagorean triangles with odd leg 2n-1.
comment: Bisection of even-numbered terms of A024361 results in alternating zero terms; removing zeros gives A068068. - _Ray Chandler_, Feb 04 2020
link: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
